positions.title: Software Development Engineer
positions.description:
MaRS – Management and remote services
• This project is about design, development and implementation of device, admin and user data management such as creating user, associate user with the set of devices etc and providing remote services such as remote tuning, turnoff/on the device etc and admin services that are used by both internal Rovi and external clients.
• Worked on OAuth 1.0a implementation for authentication.
TGxD – Total Guide XD
• This project deals with providing total guide experience to the customers through the mobile devices.
• Involved in requirement gathering, design and implementation of APIs as per customer requirements. Mainly worked on orchestration layers, which involves getting data from various provider backend consolidating them together and orchestrating them as a single JSON response and API implementations, which are consumed by mobile devices.
Phoneix-Draugen – Total guide experience for TV
• This project deals with providing total guide tv experience to the customers
• Worked on gateway layer of the application, which includes getting data from Rovi internal cloud and managing them in DAO and implementation of APIs and also orchestration of the data as per the client need.
• Played major role in converting xml-based response with XSLT to JSON-based response using groovy transformation and JSON parser.
• Worked as Scrum Master and also development work.
Technologies worked on: Java, J2EE, Hibernate ORM, JDBC, Spring boot with Jersey JAX-RS ReSTful, MySQL, SQL-Server,RAML, groovy, JSON, XML,JavaScript,Advanced ReST client, mockito, junit, tomcat, maven, crucible, versionOne, svn etc See less

given.text: I have worked with Sowmya at Rovi for about half a year. Although our paths only briefly intersected, I thought Sowmya had excellent technical skills in the area of software design, Java and code quality. Sowmya is a conscientious and detail oriented person and has a great analytical mind. She is eager ... See more

I have worked with Sowmya Halagatti for the past year with Rovi Corporations. I can only describe Sowmya as technically sound, professional, and driven to make a impact on her team in a positive way. Sowmya, is outspoke when it comes to sharing design ideas and participating in brainstorming sessions as a team; she always meets her task commitments and looks to assist others with any issue. It would be a great pleasure for me to recommend or work with Sowmya on any Software Development effort.

Sincerely,

Robert Brooks See less

Sowmya is a consistently reliable & efficient contributor. I have led & managed projects where she was an outstanding performer & a good team player. Sowmya came up to speed very quickly with the various projects and also picked up key complex projects quickly. Sowmya is thorough & systematic in her work. I am impressed by her ability to understand the customer requirements and effectively work towards completing those requirements with good quality. When needed, in an agile team, she does not hesitate to take up roles like scrum master, QA, and documentation, and does a good job in each role. I highly recommend Sowmya. See less

Sowmya worked for me as a Software Engineer, first directly, then indirectly, for more than one-and-a-half years. During that time, she primarily developed Java RESTful services that powered Rovi applications to connect consumers to their entertainment media. Sowmya is a dedicated team player, having worked on scrum teams that spanned Rovi's many worldwide offices, including Luxembourg, Mumbai, and multiple locations on the East and West coasts of the US.

Sowmya is extremely capable, triaging and solving production issues and for a period, acting as a part-time Scrum Master, along with her carrying out her usual duties of designing, implementing, and testing as a Software Engineer. I would be happy to work with Sowmya again. See less

Sowmya and I worked together on a team at HeartFlow where Sowmya built an online dashboard for tracking client cases. Sowmya was a great asset to the team - very knowledgeable, dependable, collaborative, and thorough in creating a system that provided clear and clean reports.

Sowmya was my ‘go to’ person on the test team when I had questions ranging from product behaviors to impacts of new product requirements on test efforts and timelines. Her positive attitude and knowledge set her apart from her peers. Sowmya’s commitment to the product and to her team were greatly appreciated. See less

Sowmya is an creative problem solver who enjoys working on tough assignments and challenging herself. She has been a key resource for me in the past in taking ownership of an internal web based tool using sql, servlets and javascript. Sowmya is someone I have counted on as a team lead when delegating large tasks to be distributed to others. I would hire her again given the opportunity. See less

received.text:

I highly recommend Laura.

His focus on details of work results in quality implementation of the work assigned to him. Always strive to write quality code and makes effort to improve the performance as well.
It is good to work with Robert and recommend him.
